name: Growing Frontier
description:
Made for the ScoreSpaceJam #4

Developed by Tristan Davis and Robert Harvey

A top down shooter with some plants you can use all while defending the slowly growing tree from invaders.

There are two different plants a wall/bait plant and a turret plant.

Shoot away and aim for the high score!

NOTE: On Windows computer with Nvidia cards the tiles might flicker, this is bug in the engine we used and is known.  A workaround is currently in the dev branch and will be fixed in the next version.

The following assets were used in the development of this game. These are not the work of Tristan Davis or Robert Harvey.

Fonts
wood font: http://www.publicdomainfiles.com/show_file.php?id=13502546815606
typed font: http://www.publicdomainfiles.com/show_file.php?id=13501609436782

space-shooter/top-down-shooter/ninja-adventurer: http://opengameart.org/content/superpowers-assets-various-2d
